scripts.prep-web-app: cd web-app/app/ && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.prep-web-app-staging: cd web-app/app/ && npm install && npm run build:staging && cd ../../
scripts.prep-deploy: npm run prep-infra && npm run prep-server-app && npm run prep-web-app
scripts.prep-deploy-staging: npm run prep-infra && npm run prep-server-app && npm run prep-web-app-staging
